## Logger.setBufferOptions() method

设置日志缓冲参数

**Signature:**

```typescript
setBufferOptions(size?: number, interval?: number, enabled?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | number | _(Optional)_ 缓冲区大小 |
|  interval | number | _(Optional)_ 刷新间隔（毫秒） |
|  enabled | boolean | _(Optional)_ 是否启用缓冲 |

**Returns:**

void
